name: Ropestuck
description:
This game was made in less than 12 hours, for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Swing through the scene with a rope that's permanently attached to you!

Shoot at the hook points to change your bond to them.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse Move - Aim

Mouse Click - Shoot

Software used:

Game Engine - Unity

Music Composing - Bandlab
